DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess short-term long-term effect transcutaneous pulse radio frequency treatment physiological status , subjective well-being , intensity pain . Category A Transcutaneous Pulsed Radiofrequency method widely use control pain . There known complication . In study Radiofrequency generator use separate outlet transcutaneous use . Patients recruit within clinic population patient .
DOC.detailed_description: Data assess three time , baseline testing , first second follow-up meeting ( +2-4 day intervention ; well + 40 day via post/email ) The inclusion criterion : Inclusion : - age 18 - 65 - chronic pain ( Duration three Months ) patient Pain Center Nottwil , Swiss Paraplegic Center The following criterion lead exclusion study : - severe medical issue , cancer comparable diseases - severe mental disorder severe depression schizophrenia - patient pacemaker atrial fibrillation - Women pregnant breast-feeding The primary outcome assess physiological status , assess heart rate variability ( HRV ) . Secondary outcome subjective well-being , assess `` Marburger questionnaire regard habitual well-being '' ( FW-7 ) questionnaire well intensity pain , assess numeric rating scale pain intensity ( NRS ) score 7-point Likert scale .
DOC.criteria: age 18 65 chronic pain ( Duration three Months ) patient Pain Center , Swiss Paraplegic Center , Nottwil severe medical issue , cancer comparable disease severe mental disorder severe depression schizophrenia patient pacemaker atrial fibrillation Women pregnant breastfeeding
